Plot: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.
Writer: Vikramaditya Motwane, Anurag Kashyap, Satyanshu Singh (Rohan's poems and stories), Devanshu Singh (Rohan's poems and stories)
Actors: Rajat Barmecha, Sanjay Gandhi, Ronit Roy, Manjot Singh
Title: Udaan
